name: L-Aspartate-4-semialdehyde:NAD+ oxidoreductase
rxn_str: aspsa_c + nad_c + h2o_c <=> asp__L_c + nadh_c + 2 h_c

name: propanoate:CoA ligase (ADP-forming)
rxn_str: atp_c + prpcd_c + coa_c <=> adp_c + pi_c + ppcoa_c

name: Glutarate-semialdehyde:NAD+ oxidoreductase
rxn_str: h2o_c + nad_c + oxptn_c <=> 2.0 h_c + nadh_c + glutar_c
